title: "seed loss"
format: html

```{r}
data1 %>% 
  mutate(total_seed_loss = if_else(is.na(total_seed_loss), 0, total_seed_loss)) -> data1
```


```{r}
data1 %>% 
#  filter(retrieval_time_months < 13) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=retrieval_time_months, y=total_seed_loss, color=as_factor(depth_cm))) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  facet_wrap(location ~ species) 

ggsave("figures/raw_figure.png", width = 12, height = 7)
```


```{r}
#| warning: false
drm(total_seed_loss ~ retrieval_time_months, fct = W1.3(),
  curveid = interaction(species, depth_cm), data=lub_dt) -> model_full
```


```{r}
#| warning: false
drm(total_seed_loss ~ retrieval_time_months, fct = W1.3(),
  curveid = species, data=lub_dt) -> model_red1
```

```{r}
anova(model_full, model_red2)
```

```{r}
#| warning: false
drm(total_seed_loss ~ retrieval_time_months, fct = W1.3(),
  data=lub_dt) -> model_red2
```


```{r}
anova(model_red1, model_red2)
```




```{r}
plot(model_red1)
```
